examples.example: 我努力学习，终于顺利完成了所有的作业。

translate.english: I studied hard and finally successfully completed all the homework.

examples.example: 我和小伙伴们齐心协力，顺利完成了这次艰难的任务。

translate.english: I and my little friends worked together with one heart and one mind, and successfully completed this difficult task.

examples.example: 我通过不懈的努力，顺利完成了自己设定的目标。

translate.english: I successfully completed the goals I set through unremitting efforts.
